Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45853 affecting package keras for versions less than 3.1.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45853 affecting package keras for versions less than 3.1.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package keras is earlier than 3.1.1-1, affected by CVE-2023-45853
